name: monthly-booking-tests
description: Automated tests for Monthly Booking WordPress plugin

scripts.wp:start: pkill -f "@wp-now/wp-now" 2>/dev/null || true && nohup npx -y @wp-now/wp-now start --port 8888 >/tmp/wp-now.log 2>&1 & sleep 5
scripts.test:smoke: BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8888 npx playwright test tests/mu_smoke.spec.js tests/smoke_min.spec.js --project=chromium --reporter=list --trace=on
